text:
@realDonaldTrump This is complete bullshit and you know it. You are scared to death you're going to lose.  Let me help you with your tweet. 

2020 ELECTION: MORE MAIL-IN BALLOTS WILL GO OUT TO ELIGIBLE VOTERS DUE TO COVID-19 CONCERNS..AS PRESIDENT,  I WILL ALSO BE VOTING VUA MAIL-IN BALLOT.
